text: Holy Trinity Church is a church in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England. William Shakespeare is buried beneath the stones of the floor. It is one of several sites in Stratford associated with the poet. These sites include his birthplace in Henley Street and New Place, the site of his house. == References == Category:Sites associated with William Shakespeare Category:Anglican churches in England Category:Buildings and structures in Warwickshire Category:13th-century buildings and structures
title: Holy Trinity Church
